column5: Hi all, anyone know which eye on these lures does is for shallow dives? Top or bottom eye.
I would think the bottom one Simon. It would pull up when retrieving.
shallow eye believer 6 feet of line out in prop wash with rod tip jammed in water...gets em every time. Go get em
All well and good Arizona, but which eye is the shallow eye?
Thanks Brian, but that sounds like a (reasonable) guess. I just can’t find a ‘for sure’ answer. It’s  not on the packet, I can’t find it anywhere online so I thought I’d try here.
Closer to the end of the bait = shallow.  Further away = deeper.
Closer to the  front end or the back end.   	lol
That s what I said. LMAO
A guess maybe, but it,s IMO,the most logical answer. LOL
Lol, all good, appreciate the input, helps to confirm.
